title: 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇

search.title: 电锯人 - 剧场版：蕾塞篇
search.original_title: チェンソーマン レゼ篇
search.overview: Denji became “Chainsaw Man”, a boy with a devil’s heart, and is now part of Special Division 4’s devil hunters. After a date with Makima, the woman of his dreams, Denji takes shelter from the rain. There he meets Reze, a girl who works in a café.
